original_title: Train Night View 夜の山手線 内回り
overview: The Yamanote Line is a busy loop line track that circles around the capital of Tokyo. In this movie a high-definition camera has been installed on an E235 series train as it completes its journey around the 29 stations on its circuit. The view from the driver's seat offers a unique opportunity to see some spectacular night-time views that the city has to offer.
title: Train Night View: Yamanote Line
